game.name: Joyful Masks
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Adjustable Text Size, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Step into the subconscious mind of a brilliant professor, where memories twist, logic bends, and hidden truths await discovery through intricate puzzles
